<<<<<<< HEAD
A view of the people of the vvhole vvorld, or, A short survey of their policies, dispositions, naturall deportments, complexions, ancient and moderne customes, manners, habits & fashions a worke every where adorned with philosophicall, morall, and historicall observations on the occasions of their mutations & changes throughout all ages : for the readers greater delight figures are annexed to most of the relations / scripsit J.B. ... Anthropometamorphosis J. B. (John Bulwer), fl. 1648-1654.
[12], 559, [31] p. : ill., ports.
Printed by William Hunt, London : 1654.
First published in 1650 with title: Anthropometamorphosis. Dedication signed: John Bulwer. Advertisements on p. [30-31] at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

Anthropometamorphosis J. B. (John Bulwer), fl. 1648-1654.
[12], 559, [31] p. : ill., ports.
Printed by William Hunt, London : 1654.
First published in 1650 with title: Anthropometamorphosis. Dedication signed: John Bulwer. Advertisements on p. [30-31] at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
